ygData.subject: RE: Monk Questions
ygData.msgSnippet: I just hit 21st level what level can you solo avocets or group to kill them? ... From: Robb Flynn [mailto:RobF@catmktg.com] Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999
ygData.messageBody:
I just hit 21st level what level can you solo avocets or group to kill them?

-----Original Message-----
From: Robb Flynn [mailto:RobF@...]
Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 1:35 PM
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions


From: Robb Flynn <RobF@...>

hang in there... I too have been living avocets for the past couple of weeks
and never saw one until yesterday, when I got 2 within an hour.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Dave Gaines [SMTP:dave@...]
> Sent: Monday, September 20, 1999 3:31 PM
> To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Questions
>
> From: Dave Gaines <dave@...>
>
> Black pearls come from Aviak Avocets right? I have killed all the
> avocets I really want to kill and have never gotten a black pearl.
>
> How rare of these suckers?
>
> Also, Quillmane seems to have some decent Monk equipment, do you
> take a faction hit for killing him? The equipment is no_drop.
>
>
